articles.author: Rod McGuirk
articles.title: Meta alerts young Australians to download their data before a social media ban - AP News
articles.description: Meta has started notifying young Australians to download their digital histories and delete their accounts from Facebook, Instagram, and Threads. This comes ahead of a new law banning social media for those under 16. The Australian government announced that p…
articles.content: MELBOURNE, Australia (AP) Technology giant Meta on Thursday began sending thousands of young Australians a two-week warning to downland their digital histories and delete their accounts from Facebook… [+3560 chars]
